TopicTitle: rss aestus II causes ship to explode for no reason

Articles.Content:
i try to decelerate with it, and after a little bit, my ship would just explode for no reason whatsoever, and i would get a message saying that "aestus II collided with (insert fuel tank name here), this always happens, there was no tank collision, it was fine up until the random explosion 

edit: never mind ive uninstalled realism overhaul, theres too many bugs right now, ill play with f.a.r and kw rocketry for now, it hell krakened my game then crashed it
